price: 我必定要你担负〔杀〕我的罪责，和你原有的罪恶，你将成为火狱的居民。这是不义者的报酬。”
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أُرِيدُ أَن تَبُوٓأَ بِإِثۡمِي وَإِثۡمِكَ فَتَكُونَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلنَّارِۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَٰٓؤُاْ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: innī urīdu an tabūa bi-ith'mī wa-ith'mika fatakūna min aṣḥābi al-nāri wadhālika jazāu al-ẓālimīna
